code: @Override protected void initializeProvider(InterceptorProvider provider, Bus bus) {     if (provider instanceof Client) {         provider = ((Client) provider).getEndpoint().     }     provider.getOutInterceptors().add(new EndpointCheckInterceptor()). }

public void handleMessage(Message message) throws Fault {     Exchange ex = message.getExchange().     // This test verifies that the "to" endpoint is not the from endpoint.     Endpoint endpoint = ex.get(Endpoint.class).     if ("http://localhost:9003/CamelContext/RouterPort".equals(endpoint.getEndpointInfo().getAddress())) {         throw new Fault(new Exception("bad endpoint " + endpoint.getEndpointInfo().getAddress())).     } }
